column2: For far too long, the Etruscans, our ancestral founders, have exploited the Roman people and comitted many atrocities against our kind. It's time we put an end to the reign of the Etruscans. Several senators and nobles have already rallied support and will help out, contributing their armies.
No, this isn't the time. We'll wait for a better opportunity.

After a successful war in Etrusca, the senate is very joyful. Many propose further expansion into Italia, to unite the Latins, and Hellenic people under one strong state. Many men will flock to the Roman banners in exchange for promised lands.
